topic.title: GacUI Components
topic.p: GacUI has a rich set of predefined objects in GacUI XML Resource.

topic.title: Elements
topic.p: Elements offer rendering of geometry shapes and texts.

topic.title: Compositions
topic.p: Composition offer layout algorithms based on constraints.

topic.title: Controls
topic.p: Controls offer a rich set of predefined UI functionalities.

topic.title: Control Templates
topic.p: Control Templates offer customization of control appearances.

topic.title: Item Templates
topic.p: Control Templates offer customization of list item appearances.

topic.title: Components
topic.p: Components offer other features that are not involved in rendering.
